creator: Buabit
descriptionHtml:
John will support you in practicing English conversation anywhere and anytime. He will be your personal English tutor and friend. Beginning to practise a new language with a bot is easier than with a person. You do not need to feel shy, and it does not judge you. Start practising now for free!!

PRACTICE CONVERSATION IN ENGLISH
- Practise real conversation with the bot by asking and answering questions.
- Discuss various topics including general, travel, movies, food, …, many more.

PRACTICE LISTENING SKILLS
- Improve your listening skills by hearing English pronouncing of the messages
- Listen and repeat conversation with the bot to improve your skill

LEARN NEW WORDS AND IMPROVE LANGUAGE UNDERSTANDING
- Advance your vocabulary by learning new words in the conversation
- Translation of conversed messages to your native language to support your understanding

AND MORE

- John bot is always available. You can chat with him in the morning or in the evening. He will never be tired. You can talk with him for the whole night. The most efficient way to learn English conversation is to use it as frequently as possible. Start practising by installing the app today!!

title: John English Bot - chat&learn

creator: Buabit
descriptionHtml:
John will support you in practicing English conversation anywhere and anytime. He will be your personal English tutor and friend. Beginning to practise a new language with a bot is easier than with a person. You do not need to feel shy, and it does not judge you. Start practising now for free!!

PRACTICE CONVERSATION IN ENGLISH
- Practise conversation with the bot by asking and answering questions.
- Discuss various topics including general, travel, movies, food, …, many more.

IMPROVE LISTENING SKILLS
- Practise listening by hearing English pronouncing of the messages
- Listen and repeat conversation with the bot to improve your skill

TRAIN SPEAKING TECHNIQUES
- Train speaking in English by using speech recognition by the software
- Talking for interacting with John in actual conversation

SIMPLIFY CONVERSATION WITH TRANSLATION
- Ease your learning by translation support from your native language
- Simplify learning of the sentences that you want to use

LEARN NEW WORDS AND IMPROVE LANGUAGE UNDERSTANDING
- Advance your vocabulary by learning new words in the conversation
- Translation of conversed messages to your native language to support your understanding

AND MORE

- John bot is always available. You can chat with him in the morning or in the evening. He will never be tired. You can talk with him for the whole night. The most efficient way to learn English conversation is to use it as frequently as possible. Start practising by installing the app today!!

Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/john.english.bot
